name: FromLabortoRefreshment
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Blogger Todd E. Creason has run a popular blog for years, "From Labor to Refreshment". Now you can enjoy the blog on the go with this Amazon Echo skill that will read his latest blog entries. Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
